articles.title: Freddie Flintoff airlifted to hospital following car crash while filming Top Gear, England cricket...
articles.description: The England cricket legend was shooting an episode of the BBC series at Dunsfold Park aerodrome in Surrey on Tuesday when the accident occurred.
articles.content:
Freddie Flintoff was airlifted to hospital following a car crash during filming for Top Gear in Surrey on Monday.

articles.author: Avani Dias, Som Patidar
articles.title: India's gender pay gap is among the worst in the world. But the women's cricket team hopes to change that
articles.description: India is the second country in the world to introduce pay parity for its men's and women's cricket teams. Now there are calls for Australia to do the same.
articles.content:
India's women's cricket captain Harmanpreet Kaur is a household name who has smashed international records, but like most women in the world, she's been underpaid.
Last week, when Kaur led her team … [+9643 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
